casebody.data:
Eugene W. ELLISON and Howard McGlohon
v.
CITY OF ASHEVILLE, Eagle Market Streets Development Corp., a North Carolina Corporation. No. 615P04. Supreme Court of North Carolina. February 3, 2005. Java O. Warren, Charlotte, for Ellison and McGlohon. Robert W. Oast, Jr., for City of Asheville. Martin K. Reidinger, Asheville, for Eagle Market Dev. Corp.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Plaintiffs on the 10th day of December 2004 in this matter for a writ of certiorari to review the order of the North Carolina Court of Appeals, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 3rd day of February 2005."
